---
title: "freshmen survey (2014)"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)

theme_set(theme_minimal())

s <- read_csv("freshmen-survey_csv.csv")
s %<>%
    slice(27:34) %>%  # slice to isolate grade data
    mutate( grade = Survey,
            percent =`Universities(Baccalaureate Institutions)`) %>% 
    select( grade, percent )

s$grade[1:2] <- "A"
s$grade[3:5] <- "B"
s$grade[6:7] <- "C"

s %>% 
    group_by( grade ) %>% 
    summarise( total = sum( percent ) ) %>% 
    ggplot( aes(x = fct_reorder( grade, total ), y = total ) ) +
        geom_bar( stat = "identity",
                  color = "black",
                  fill = "#00c0ff",
                  alpha = 0.8,
                  width = 0.5,
                  ) +
        coord_flip() +
        labs( y = "students enrolled (%)",
              x = "",
              title = "high school grade average for incoming university freshmen"
              )

```
